testcase.name: Consistency Assertion Missing Formula Test
testcase.description: Consistency check static analysis for missing formulae.

variation.name: Missing formulae example
variation.description: Missing formulae example. (Valid cases from directory 32210 test cases has been modified by commenting-out the relationship to the formula, and also commenting out the formula and its relationships to prevent anything from being evaluated.) Since formula doesn't fire there are no fact items in results file, and no occurences of assertions to count.
